title: The Works of Anton Checkov
description: Anton Checkov's plays and stories are collected here in one giant collection. An active table of contents makes it easy to navigate to the work you want to find.Works The Bishop and Other StoriesThe Chorus Girl and Other StoriesThe Cook's Wedding and Other StoriesThe Darling and Other StoriesThe Duel and Other StoriesThe Horse-Stealers and Other StoriesThe House with the Mezzanine and Other StoriesThe Lady with the Dog and Other StoriesLoveThe PartyThe Schoolmaster and Other StoriesThe Schoolmistress and Other StoriesThe SlandererThe Wife and Other StoriesThe WitchIvanoffPlaysThe Sea-GullSwan SongUncle VanyaLetters
author: Anton Chekhov
